metadata.title: CVE-2019-17637 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of Eclipse Web Tools Platform through release 3.18(2020-06), XML and DTD files referring to external entities could beexploited to send the contents of local files to a remote server whenedited or validated, even when external entity resolution is disabled inthe user preferences.

criterions.comment: eclipse-wtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
